text: Franco Graziosi (10 July 1929 â€“ 8 September 2021) was an Italian actor. He was born in Macerata, Italy. He began his career in 1960. He was best known for his roles in The Terrorist, Duck, You Sucker! and We Have a Pope. Graziosi died on 8 September 2021 in Rome at the age of 92. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1929 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian stage actors Category:Italian voice actors
